author: Reuters Editorial
title: Tillerson says U.S policy on North Korea executed by State Department has succeeded
text:
NAIROBI (Reuters) - The United States policy on North Korea executed by the State Department has succeeded, Secretary of State Rex Tillerson said on Friday.
U.S. Secretary of State Rex Tillerson arrives at Djibouti–Ambouli International Airport in Djibouti, March 9, 2018. REUTERS/Jonathan Ernst “As we’ve seen in the last 24 hours, the policy we’ve put in place (on North Korea) and executed by the State Department has succeeded,” Tillerson told a news conference in the Kenyan capital.
Reporting By Maggie Fick, editing by Larry King
